name: Strat Attack
description:
This is a very early prototype of a game where the enemies are supposed to adapt to your play style. Each round the enemies will change slightly and, in theory, should become harder over a number of rounds.

If you play this game for more than 5 rounds, I'd really appreciate it if you zip up the logs directory and email it to 2kah.user[@]gmail.com. This will allow me to see how the learning algorithm performs.

Controls

WASD - movement
Mouse - aim
Left click - fire
